name: M S WELFARE SOCIETY REHABILITATION AND TRAINING CENTRE
briefDescription: SAMARPAN under M.S.WELFARE SOCIETY is a non-profit organization working for the welfare of mentally challenged children. The special children are getting all the required therapies including special education, speech therapy, occupational therapy , physio-therapy, sensory motor therapy & vocational training. All the team members are dedicated & well trained in the field of special education.
